# Dataset experiment info element schema

**Description:** Dataset experiment info element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

## Animal Model

**Label:** animalModel

**Description:** List of animal model(s) the recorded data is from.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://uri.neuinfo.org/nif/nifstd/readable/animalModel) <details>

## Recording Region

**Label:** recordingRegion

**Description:** List of anatomical regions the nerual data is recorded from.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#region) <details>

```json
{
```

## Electrical Recording Protocol

**Label:** recordingProtocol

**Description:** Electrophysiological assays that were used to generate the data.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#wasGeneratedBy) <details>
